basics.name: Jeremy Fourna
basics.label: Product Manager
basics.summary: Product Manager/Functional Project Manager with more than 5 years of experience in the web, e-commerce, warehouse management system and the marketplace industries

work.summary:
- Product Manager of a WMS called OMS (From Rocket Internet)
- Allow OMS to work with multiple warehouse on the same instance
- Refactoring of existing process to reduce cost and improve user productivity

- Overhaul of the onboarding process for customers : reducing launch times by 82.5%
- Launch of dashboards : possibility for customers to track their performance
- Development of a feature to define the objectives of COS / ROI for AdWords & Shopping campaigns on a product level
- Implementation of an automatic process to charge customers based on their advertising spending : saving time for the accounting team

- Coordination of marketplaces integration (Galeries Lafayette, Zalando, Spartoo, Privalia, Tmall) in the application : improving customer loyalty and increasing revenues by 20%
- Design and supervision of the modules development for PrestaShop, Magento and Hybris : registration of dozens of new clients
- Revision of the product catalogs management : improving their publication and increasing the number of marketplaces available for each customer

volunteer.organization: Festival EKlore des Talents et de l'Emploi
volunteer.summary: Build the website for the event
highlights: More than 800 people registered for the event via the website

volunteer.summary: Tranlate JS API from English to French
